title: Trendsplosive 6/9: Fox News, Diet Coke, Ryan Kelley, Jurassic World: Dominion, RRR, Joker 2
itunes:title: Trendsplosive 6/9: Fox News, Diet Coke, Ryan Kelley, Jurassic World: Dominion, RRR, Joker 2
description:
In this edition of Trendsplosive, Jack and Miles discuss Fox and Friends' butler banter, the polarizing nature of Diet Coke, a GOP Fuckery round-up, Miles' mesozoic movie mission, the trailer for the new Indian action film 'RRR', and 'Joker 2' getting greenlit!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
